content: needle 2 stc only work a total of 11 chart repeats row 1 rs sl1 wyif k1  sl1 wyib k1 repeat toe 64 sts total between  until 2 stc left sl1 wyif k1 32 first needle 32 second needle row 2 ws sl1wyif k1 p until 2 stc left sl1wyif k1 round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 stcs before end of needle1 row 3 rs sl1 wyif k1  sl1 k1  repeat between  k2tog k1 on needle 2 k1 ssk k to 3 stcs before end of until 2 stc left sl1wyif k1 needle1 k2tog k1 repeat row 2 and 3 17 times which gives you 17 round 2 k1 ktbl knit to the end second needle k1 slipped stitches along the edge of the heel flap ktbl knit to the end repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 12 stcs on each needle cut yarn leaving a 12-inch 30 cm tail graft toe using kitchener stitch ©️2025 glin gren knits all rights reserved for personal use only do not copy distribute or sell this pattern belma socks by glin gren ©️2025 glin gren knits all rights reserved for personal use only do not copy distribute or sell this pattern
